tourBios.curYrHigh: Earned fully exempt status for the PGA TOUR China Series' season by finishing T12 at the Second Global Qualifying Tournament. Looked destined for conditional status after 54 holes, thanks to three consecutive 75s to start the tournament. Fired a 3-under 69 on the final day at CTS Tycoon GC to move from a tie for 20th when the day begin.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA Tour China Serie was T12th in 2015 at the Hainan Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T45th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the PGA Tour China Series.
